attributes.action: East-West rail link between Oxford and East Anglia
attributes.additional_details:
East West Rail Link is a proposed new rail route in England to provide a fast outer orbital railway to the north of London, linking the Great Western Main Line, Oxford, Bicester, Milton Keynes, Bedford, Cambridge, Ipswich and Norwich for both passenger and freight traffic. It is being promoted by the East-West Rail Consortium, a consortium of local authorities and interested bodies along the route.

http://eastwestrail.org.uk/
